name: june
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the sixth month of the year, after May and before July: A lot of people get married in June. His birthday is on 21 June. Last June we had a lot of rain.
More examplesFewer examplesElla's birthday is on 10 June.You can't rely on the weather in June.They got married in June.
